item.description:
THIS EVENT IS SOLD OUT


The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge the weekend of December 11th to welcome new members and guests for a weekend of skiing & snowboarding. Discount tickets will be available for only $25 to Bretton Woods.

We are about 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Cranmore, and Black Mountain.

Come up and join us for the weekend. Guests are welcome for a reduced rate of only $10 per night guest fee. Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+

**We are also running a charity event this weekend. Please bring up your used goggles to donate to YES, a non-profit organization that brings inner city kids skiing, among other things. The goggles must include the following:

Elasticity in the strap
Padding on the frame
No cracked lenses

This is a simple and easy way to help out those not as fortunate to enjoy something we all love - skiing and riding.

Thanks!
item.name: New Member Weekend, December 11 - 13
